title: Tab插件
author: 红尘红尘y
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: pc85
replies.txt_content:
player-list:

  # Toggles this feature.
  enabled: true

  # Sets the header of the player list.
  #
  # Single line format.
  # header: 'My header text'
  #
  # Multiple line format.
  # header:
  # - 'My first line'
  # - 'My second line'
  # - 'My third line'
  header:
  - ''
  - '${shine:[0;2;0][0;25;0][0;25;0][&3;&e]虚无区欢迎您的到来!}'
  - ''

  # Sets the footer of the player list.
  #
  # Single line format.
  # footer: 'My footer text'
  #
  # Multiple line format.
  # footer:
  # - 'My first line'
  # - 'My second line'
  # - 'My third line'
  footer:
  - ''
  - '&7请注意游戏时间适当休息哦'
  - '&7当前时间: &b%server_time_HH:mm%'
  - ''
  - '${right-to-left} &b%{online}&7/&b%{max} &7在线玩家 ${left-to-right}'



配置里面改，记得启用

replies.txt_content:
